name: circular_buffer_js
description: TS implementation of a circular buffer and also a JS compile-down. Well tested (which is the point)

scripts.dist: cp build/es6/circular_buffer.d.ts dist/ && cp build/circular_buffer.iife.js dist/
scripts.minify: npm run minify-esm && npm run minify-iife && npm run minify-cjs
scripts.prep: npm run clean && npm run version
scripts.make: npm run typescript && npm run bundle
scripts.finalize: npm run minify && npm run docs && npm run dist
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run make && npm run test && npm run finalize
scripts.ci: npm run build && echo TODO archive docs

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
